data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Dar`a you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dar‘a, Syria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Dar‘a, Syria. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Dar‘a, Syria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Dar‘a, Syria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Persian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Persian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Persian people is yours.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Dar‘a, Syria will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,957 believers in Dar`a, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dar‘a, Syria has a population of 1,027,000.

We estimate Dar`a has 1,957 people who might know Jesus, 56,792 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 968,251 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 524 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,957 believers in Dar`a to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,025,043 lost friends and neighbors.
